column4: Hello i have installed ubuntu server, but is just like terminal how can i join in a graphical mode??????????
That's part of the point - the GUI eats up system resources.
I actually never got a wireless manager program working under Edgy - you can use the command line.
yeah it works how can i configurate it?
i did it but how can i change the configurations to set up for my wireless

sudo iwconfig (interface) ESSID (router's ESSID)
2007-04-09T14:17:00.000Z	wiikki	spasticteapot	is wlan0
2007-04-09T14:18:00.000Z	spasticteapot	wiikki	Did it work?
2007-04-09T14:19:00.000Z	wiikki	spasticteapot	but you didn't tell me what I need to set, how can it know that's is my wireless connection?  i mean how to set the name pass etc...
2007-04-09T14:19:00.000Z	wiikki	spasticteapot	nope , normal key- 5796727545
2007-04-09T14:20:00.000Z	spasticteapot	wiikki	Normal?  There is no normal" kind of encryption.
Try "sudo iwconfig wlan0 key (whatever your key is).
just that? i don't think so really maybe something like:
iwconfig essid 2WIRE811 Channel 6 ap any key 5796727545
=D let me check, what do you know about  "iwlist scanning" what does exaclty ?
